name: Ultimate Snowboard
description:
My entry for GBJam 5. Not gonna lie, I could have managed my time better and ended up with something a bit deeper, but hey. Either way, I hope you enjoy! The music was also made by me.

Keyboard Controls:

Z = Confirm/Jump

X = Perform Trick

Enter = Start/Pause

Gamepad Controls:

A = Confirm/Jump

B = Perform Trick

Start = Start/Pause
